function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Prevalence of COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict public health measures, vaccination programs, and community education","Technologies":"Contact tracing technology, vaccine distribution technology, and public health surveillance systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers, and essential workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities, and community leaders"},{"Description":"Perception of gated communities as segregated urban form","Impact":"Social segregation and potential lack of community-wide public health measures","Mitigation":"Promotion of inclusive community design, implementation of community health initiatives, and education on public health responsibility","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, urban planning software, and public health education tools","People":"Gated community residents, urban planners, and policymakers","Owner":"Urban planning authorities and community leaders"},{"Description":"Differences in social experience between gated and non-gated community residents during the pandemic","Impact":"Potential disparities in social well-being and mental health","Mitigation":"Implementation of community support programs, mental health services, and social connectivity initiatives","Technologies":"Telehealth platforms, community support apps, and mental health monitoring tools","People":"Gated and non-gated community residents, mental health professionals, and community organizers","Owner":"Community leaders, mental health organizations, and local government"}]}
